duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct structure-property relationship studies of polymeric materials and advanced imaging technologies.
Perform chemical/biological characterization, solvent extraction, chromatographic separation, and spectral interpretation.
Independently develop new analytical methods, design and execute complex, non-standard laboratory studies.
Prepare high-quality technical documents and thoroughly document experiments.
Interact with lens designers, contact lens metrology leads, Clinical Project leads, and Vision/Data Scientists.
Conduct studies, prepare and modify formulations, and participate in lens fabrication and characterization.
Search literature, design and conduct experiments to test ideas, and discuss and write technical reports.

education_certification.credential: Enrollment in an accredited university or college pursuing at least a Bachelors level degree in Chemistry, Polymer Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry, Polymer Science, Organic Chemistry, Materials Science, Chemical Engineering, Biochemistry, Biology, Biotechnology, Process Engineering, Ocular Cell Biology or related major.
